message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust in later rounds if you'd prefer.
I'd rather have a slight edge, but still willing to compromise
I'm willing to move closer to your offer, but I'd like to see a more even split.  Let's try 45/55.
I'm not budging much, but willing to give you a small chance
We're getting close to the end.  Let's compromise.  I'll accept a 35/65 split, but I won't go lower.
